SEARCH
Package fr.softsf.sudofx2024.utils

Class I18n

java.lang.Object
fr.softsf.sudofx2024.utils.I18n
public final class I18n extends Object
Utility class for internationalization (i18n) support. This class manages language resources and provides methods to switch between languages and retrieve localized strings.

  • Method Details

    • setLocaleBundle

      public static void setLocaleBundle(String i18n)
      Sets the current language for the application.
      Parameters:
      i18n - The String representation of the language ("EN" for English, or any other value for French)

    • getValue

      public static String getValue(String key)
      Retrieves the localized string value for a given key.
      Parameters:
      key - The String key representing the desired localized string
      Returns:
      The localized String value
      Throws:
      MissingResourceException - if the key is not found in the resource bundle

    • getLanguage

      public static String getLanguage()
      Gets the current language of the application.
      Returns:
      The language code as a String (e.g., "fr" for French, "en" for English)
